game.title: Rust
game.description: A complex multiplayer survival game based on a toxic wasteland with the objective to survive against other players, animals, and a harsh environment

game.title: GTA V
game.description: A complex multiplayer criminal simulator game in a modern world with an objective to build up your criminal enterprise

game.title: Terraria
game.description: A 2d blocky survival game in a fantisy world with many bosses and places to explore

game.title: Minecraft
game.description: An open world blocky survival game with many building and exploring opportunities

game.title: CSGO
game.description: An old crappy first person shooter with overpriced skins, to win you need to be good at camping and quickscoping

game.title: Animal Crossing New Horizons
game.description: Take a vacation to a deserted island owned by Tom Nook inc. Only to end up in debt and never leave.

game.title: Genshin Impact
game.description: Multiplayer game where you try to find your twin through the open world of Teyvat.

game.title: Bad Ice-cream
game.description: Navigate through a maze as an ice-cream with thick eyebrows.

game.title: Fire Boy and Water Girl
game.description: Two player game where you navigate through a temple and try not to die.

game.title: Cool Math Games
game.description: Started out to teach to math in wholesome way. Probably not anymore. More likely to end up playing flashplayer games than doing actual math.

game.title: Stardew Valley
game.description: You are an office worker and your grandpa left you an inheritance...it is a farm. Goodluck trying to build your farming empire. Time limits do apply.

game.title: Bear and Breakfast
game.description: Build your bed and breakfast empire as a bear with opposable thumbs. If the real world is not stressful eniugh you can always take up a mangement position keeping customers happy in Bear and Breakfast.

game.title: Avalanche
game.description: You are a penguin being chased by a Yeti who is also being chased by avalanche.

game.title: Crossy Road
game.description: You play as a chicken who is trying to cross the road. Guess what happens if you do not cross the road? You die.

game.title: Dinosaur Game
game.description: Jump over the cactus when your WI-FI is offline. Even offline chrome will still eat your RAM.

game.title: Pac-Man
game.description: Run away from ghosts and eat dots. It is pretty self explanatory.

game.title: Subway Surfer
game.description: Despite never learning from your past mistakes you continue to tag subways all over the world. Security is after you in every city you visit.

game.title: Pong
game.description: Classic arcade game where you play ping pong back and forth against your opponent or your computer.

game.title: Snake
game.description: Navigate around a screen and try eat an apple. Usually the default game on elderly devices.

game.title: Tetris
game.description: A block puzzle game where you stack bricks into a grid. Great practice for future brick layers.
